main.name: CineCruise Project
main.description: CineCruise is a React-based movie website that allows users to search for movies by title, sort them by genre, view trending and upcoming movies,see the trailer of the movies and bookmark their favorite movies. The website is designed to be user-friendly and visually appealing.This web app can fetch movies from the MovieDB API and its IMDB rating and presentation nicely
main.bio: I'm Samuel, a software developement engineer specializing in creating dynamic web applications. With expertise in both front-end and back-end development, I bring a comprehensive approach to building efficient solutions. On the front-end, I have a strong command of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and skilled in popular libraries and frameworks like React, Angular and Vue.Js. I enjoy crafting user interfaces that provide an exceptional user experience. On the back-end, I'm proficient in server-side languages such as Node.js and Python, and I have experience working with databases like MySQL and MongoDB. I'm also well-versed in RESTful APIs and know how to integrate third-party services effectively.
main.bio1: At Cinecruise, we want to amuse the world. We provide access to top-tier TV shows, documentaries, feature films, regardless of your preferences or location. The website allows users to search for movies by title, sort them by genre, view trending and upcoming movies,see the trailer of the movies and bookmark their favorite movies. Stay updated with the latest movies trends.
main.contactmessage: Biko! You fit send me message here, Thank you.
